              ["In particular, it’s a bad idea to use "],

              [" in a "],
              ["GROUP BY", [["c"]]],
              [" query, because a standard "],
              ["GROUP BY", [["c"]]],
              [
                " clause requires enumerating the columns. Many developers have, unfortunately, done that."
